name: The Last Dream (Marko Korunic)
description:
Facing his imminent death, a man closes his eyes to relive moments in a place he once called home.

  • Short story driven exploration game
  • Face the demons of the past
  • Explore the valley under the Stormclaw Peak, and the village of Bleaker Pass
  • Find hidden pieces of lore scattered around the landscape

This is my first proper project I decided to share with the world, I hope you enjoy it.

Controls are visible at any time in the pause menu(Esc).
